website_summaries.verdict: You'll work through your burn pile in no time with the Logosol Smart-Splitter. Just mount it to a to a sturdy stump and start splitting.
pros: Best for small to medium size wood and larger pieces of already split firewood
Eliminates danger of swinging a hatchet
Always hits log in the right place
Handles recommended wood length of 16 inches
Works well on wood diameters of 12-16 inches
cons: Wear long pants and closed-toe shoes when using, because chips may fall on your toes

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but there are better solutions out there for the money
customer_reviews.text: The splitter works as advertised but it is time consuming both for setup and to split wood as well as labor intensive for the upper arms. My 24 yr old daughter was able to work it as well given a bit of practice. It's adequate, packs small and is easy to transport, but requires a drill and bit to set it up each time you move it (assuming you don't take the base log with you). Used it to split about 2 cords of wood over several days of effort. Replaced it with the only slightly more expensive SunJoe LJ10M which works much easier / quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this splitter now for a few months and love it. It was easy to setup, it's great to use and I am a petit woman and am able to split quite large logs. I would definitely buy this again and recommend to all who want to split wood safely and without the use of gas or electricity. I would recommend getting a rubber hammer or something that you can us for the few times that the splitter gets stuck in the log (it mostly happens where there is a branch hole or something else in the wood that causes the fibers to run a different direction).
customer_reviews.author: Brad Young

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: My husband usually splits our wood off grid. However every now and again I need to. I have two herniated disks in my neck and can no longer swing an ax. This wonderful little gadget has made my life so much easier and now I can participate as well. 5 stars....
customer_reviews.author: Brendalee

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: We have received a lot of very chunky firewood this year, so we needed to split some of the big logs for in our wood stove. This wood-splitter has made this so much easier than trying to do this with an axe. They included even the drill bit in the package, which should be included in the description. We went out and bought a drill bit before we opened the package. This splitter works so much better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Design
customer_reviews.text: This contraption relies on the strength if 8 threads that will continuously take a pounding. A lock washer may have helped but there was none supplied. I made it through a couple of logs that took many hours. The threads backed out of the hole and the bolt threads got stripped out. So this piece of crap is no more. I hope the ax-head can take some more work because I am re-configuring to a device that will split some wood. Don't waste your money, buy a maul.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this summer. Never got around to setting up or using until today. Love this thing! Great for smaller material. Things too small for a maul. Best part about it. . . Safe and easy to use. You would have to work real hard to hurt yourself with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: tell family

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Log Splitter
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Thought it was kind of gimmicky when I saw the ad, but very impressed when I finally got it and used it. I split about 3/4 cord of fresh cut green pear logs already. Fast, easy and most important safe. I can split up to 14 or 15 inches, but it does some time - have to go around the edge. Up to 4 or 5 inches, even green log will split after a couple whacks ! Pricy, but you get worth every penny. Most important, it is SAFE.
customer_reviews.author: Retired75th

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our Smart Splitter!
customer_reviews.text: No more scary swinging axes and mauls! I have no problem using a chainsaw, but I hate blades. Our neighbor is kind enough to help us cut and haul our wood, and often does the first split, so the Smart Splitter is perfect for us to split into smaller pieces without his help. We're finally independent when it comes to splitting our wood! Have only been using it for a few weeks, but so far we are loving it! We don't have huge volume (about a cord) so it's just perfect for our use. Great value for the money. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TOOL FOR SMALL LOGS
customer_reviews.text: I like the design that it will mount on a basic chopping block. Unfortunately, It is a little lightweight for tough wood like eucalyptus.
customer_reviews.author: SkullMonkey

customer_reviews.title: and he doesn't like to return gifts
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd tried out the electric log splitter instead. This requires multiple efforts to split one log, and the noise of the metal hammer hitting the metal base is probably louder than a machine log splitter. It was a Christmas present for my husband, and he doesn't like to return gifts! So we kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This log splitter works great for making firewood for our at home firepit. Portable. Easy to use. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we like the splitter and it is much safer than a ...
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. on soft woods it only takes a few strokes. on hard wood that is two or three years old, it takes six or eight strokes for a 10 inch diameter log (sometimes more if the wood is thready). overall, we like the splitter and it is much safer than a splitting maul and handier than a sledge and a wedge.
customer_reviews.author: northstate dweller

customer_reviews.title: Good splitter
customer_reviews.text: We ha one of these previously. We wore it out, so this is the replacement. My wife loves it because she can split kindling without any help.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Misch

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well on dry wood
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well on dry wood, but you'll still need other tools to help with anything green or stubborn knotty pieces. I am going to be using it to re-split wood that needs to be made into kindling or smaller pieces as it's needed for the fireplace/stove but I can't imagine using it to split large quantities of wood would go any better than a quality splitting maul.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kronvold

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but still requires effort.
customer_reviews.text: Still requires a lot of work but it makes splitting logs safer and much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to scavenge firewood in urban settings without attracting ...
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to scavenge firewood in urban settings without attracting much attention. Keep under the backseat of my truck ever handy. Does what it says it will !
customer_reviews.author: pelenaka lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively lightweight, sharp, plenty of travel for the blade. I use it for firewood...larger staves to smaller.
customer_reviews.author: P. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Smart Splitter
customer_reviews.text: We have a wood stove and our wood was semi green. We didn't have enough kindling and I was having a hard time getting the fires going. I searched online for a tool that we could use to make the job easy for splitting the wood we had. Based on the reviews I purchased The Smart Splitter. I haven't used it, but my husband has and he really likes it. He split a bunch of wood and we have plenty of kindling. He has also told a few of his buddies at work about it. It saves on his back and is really easy to use. I feel it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this device - excellent splitter for larger pieces and the kindling cutter is great. Watching the videos on YouTube helped. Easy for a smaller woman to use. It's really key to have a solid stump of the right size (see directions) and *not* soft wood. The kit even includes a drill bit of the right size - thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Goya Ensor

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this thing and shows it to any and everyone that steps foot in our house. He says it is the best purchase he's made this year and everyone in need of splitting wood should have one. Super easy to use, he says. He uses it to chop half logs into more manageable pieces and also into kindle size sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Works great and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I took a chance on this wood splitter. Saves the back and is safer than gas or electric log splitters. Includes the 20mm drill bit needed to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: phi1776

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This works beautifully with a small amount of setup time.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Splitter works ok
customer_reviews.text: The splitter works mostly as the videos I watched prior to purchasing it claimed. My only complaint was that it actually requires more physical force than appears in the video. It comes with the drill bit to make the whole which I did not realize and was very happy not to have to buy that. Even so I would purchase again and recommend the splitter.
customer_reviews.author: fayfay

customer_reviews.title: Works best with aged wood
customer_reviews.text: With aged wood it worked just like the video. With wood less than a year old it didn't split the wood (live oak) without extreme effort.
customer_reviews.author: ric dexter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I had an eight year old split wood for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: This tool is awesome. Cost effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awesome. Cost effective and easy to use. Recently had a number of trees taken down on our property and this has made splitting them easy and on demand. No renting a splitter or paying someone to do it. Wife can do it, even my son wants to. Love it
customer_reviews.author: IACATS@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Only issue was drill provided did not drill a hole to the recommended depth. Otherwise the splitter works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a machine!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wood burning stove, you need the smart splitter. Use your splitting maul to turn rounds into large chunks. Use the smart splitter to quickly reduce large chunks into the perfect size for your stove. Fast and safe. Very, very impressed with this tool!
customer_reviews.author: S. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Turns a log into kindling in no time. Really fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Function is exactly as advertised and I ma very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: After lumbar fusion I had to come up with a solution. On cost basis alone this is a winner. Function is exactly as advertised and I ma very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this works great and great customer service from whom we bought from very nice and helpful lady
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: This is my second smart splitter. I love the idea that it's easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second smart splitter. I love the idea that it's easy to use. Mo son, 10 y.o. can do it. The only reason why I put 3 stars because the first one was broken after 6 months. I hope the second one will work way longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ilanka

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very pleased. Simple to use, safe, and time saving. Takes a few more hits on the bigger logs, but totally worth it. Now I can be more than just the "log carrier" when we chainsaw (we only have 1) & split wood :)
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: The Smart Splitter really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was really amazed by how well this log splitter works. It is fun to use and takes very little effort to split perfect size firewood. The kindling feature chops small pieces that you could not easily or safely chop with a hatchet and definately not with a large gas powered unit. It is a breeze to assemble and you can take it to the site of your logs, chop them, and then take it and your firewood home. As you can tell, I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I received my order, but the package was all busted on both ends the rods were hanging out. Everything was all right the splitter seems to work rely well, I would recommend this to a friend .
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Thought at first "what can this thing possible do" so I watched the video which was very helpful and definitely convinced me it works. Bought one and put it to the test. Worked great with small logs and great for making the kindling.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Really works well.
customer_reviews.text: Makes splitting wood much easier for us old folks and even our son appreciated it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Simple and safe wood splitting
customer_reviews.text: Takes some work to get set up, but makes splitting wood so much easier and safer
customer_reviews.author: Nevin Rallis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of it you will find yourself surround by mountains of split wood.
customer_reviews.author: Bitter

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever
customer_reviews.text: Best invention ever! Spring wood is so much easier. Great work out, great craftmanship, easy to move around. Well worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: christopher clark

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Splitter (Not for Huge Pieces)...
customer_reviews.text: Item works great on smallish pieces of wood, and also for kindling. I never got it to work well for awkward pieces, or massive ones. Good for what it is though. Saves your back a bit, and helped us to get through the winter without a gas-powered splitter this last year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: What a great, simple, effective, well-constructed and inexpensive tool. Perfect for the weekend log splitting needs of someone like me who does not have to tackle a forest of trees. I can break up larger cuts of wood into the smallest pieces of kindling I need with safety and ease or just do quarter cuts. Would recommend to anyone who is a home owner.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for making kindling
customer_reviews.text: Coming up on two years using this splitter, does a great job. Not sure I would use it for whole logs, but for splitting logs down for kindling it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: I love this tool and have recommended it to many friends
customer_reviews.text: I can safely split wood! And I do it everyday. I love this tool and have recommended it to many friends. If this one ever breaks, I'll be buying another one immediately. It is everything the video shows. Brilliant invention.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very, very good at splitting kindling. I'm an older citizen with a bad back but I had no trouble splitting a big pile quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ardith Dahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use splitter
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Having hefted an axe in the past, I am happy to have such an upright system to use that has nothing to do with aiming! If the logs are too big in diameter (bigger than 8" to 10") the splitter is not as effective.
customer_reviews.author: margo m.

customer_reviews.title: Chop Chop
customer_reviews.text: It took me about a year before i actually put this thing together. I drilled a hole into a stump uot back, like the picture and I got to work . In this part of Florida you can purchase pre-cut wood that burns readily on your fire place. recently I purchased some wood thatwas cut too big and I smoked out my living room. Much to the dismay of my wife. Enter the smart splitter. It looks like nothing much, but the efficent way it goes through the wood is almost unbelieveable! In minutes I had split at least 4 logs. Follow the directions carefully and you'll be set. Great tool. Economic too!
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Splitting wood is still a lot of work
customer_reviews.text: This splitter does make splitting firewood safe and less inconvenient. It is not as easy as the factory promulgated videos would make you believe, but I can still use it to split our firewood, even though I have had shoulder surgery in the past 4 months. You may have to strike a log 20 or 30 times to split it (unlike the 1 or 2 strikes required in the video). I am certain that it is a better option than a maul and wedge for almost everyone. I still want a power splitter, however.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Easier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. I am not sure of it's durability but for now it works great. Just in time for really cold weather. It is also a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Tammen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making kindling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making kindling. Great for splitting wood - after you've split the log in at least half. For whole logs it can take a few "wacks" to get through it. But once you've got the initial split done it makes breaking down the wood easy.
customer_reviews.author: VTMathProfessor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Even for a women who stands at 5'-1".
customer_reviews.author: NBED

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Made a platform out of 6 x 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Made a platform out of 6 x 6 treated wood for stump substitute. Just ensure your splitting the wood between the grain and works like a charm. Much safer than the old school method. The kindling option is icing on the cake!
customer_reviews.author: Al Gondran

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, I love using it. very good quality. I would recommend to all my friends ( I already did )
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Save your back!! Get this NOW!!
customer_reviews.text: We looked at videos of this and then finally got one. OMG!!! SO easy my 12 yr old daughter is hooked on splitting wood!! Get kevlar gloves a the cutting edge is VERY sharp!! LOVE LOVE LOVE this!! We also got the cutting station(wood holder) and love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Dawn Hewlett

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant idea. Works great. Unfortunately the rubber broke in half first day.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were skeptical that the Smart Splitter would perform as advertised, but I can't hit the broad side of a barn with an axe, so we decided to give it a try. I'm home more than he is and wanted to participate in the wood splitting. With the Smart Splitter I can now split wood, even wood he can't split with an axe. We are both amazed. And, as an added bonus, I've found it to be a great stress reliever after a tough day at work.
customer_reviews.author: cateyecottage

customer_reviews.title: I bought this a while ago. I have been ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while ago. I have been using the heck out of it. My boyfriend chops the big logs down, then I use this to make kindling.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kealy

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but as others have stated the nylon washer has failed after 2 hours of use. The great thing is, I called Bailey's customer service and they are sending a replacement out to me today. Its going to be a pain to have to replace these, but its still better/cheaper than renting a splitter or doing it the old fashion back breaking way.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Solid and effective - probably better to have seasoned wood but still okay for even ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid and effective - probably better to have seasoned wood but still okay for even fairly big rounds - just a few more drops.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Using the Smart Splitter
customer_reviews.text: A LITTLE HARDER TO USE THAN THE VIDEO SHOWS, BUT IT IS STILL WORTH EVERY PENNY! Don't hestiate to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Weick

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Really easy to set up and to use. Logs up to 6-8 inches diameter (and not too long) are easily split.
customer_reviews.author: Bill West

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to worry about hitting my foot with ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to worry about hitting my foot with a swinging ax anymore, nor do I ever miss where I want to hit the log because the wedge starts out in contact with it. yay!
customer_reviews.author: Matthias Arter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Love it! Makes splitting wood so much easier than with wedges and sledgehammer or an ax.
customer_reviews.author: LGG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Cut the white nylon washer in half so it would last longer and it is doing fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so much fun. I know that sounds a bit off, but it's easy and doesn't take too many times to split a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sunbeam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: firestarted wood quick and easy enough for grandkids to get the project done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am old and have bad shoulder joints so I Cann not swing an axe
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my use. I am old and have bad shoulder joints so I Cann not swing an axe. This works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This takes me a few tries,but I can split wood!!
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: it almost make chopping wood fun. It works very well and i so satisfying!! like you are a marksman with an ax !
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kezlarian

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: The key to this device is the fact that the axe blade holds the log in place while you lift the weight to smash down on the axe head. No aiming involved. No worry about the log flying off the base if it is cut evenly on both ends. Even irregular logs pretty much stay in place. One thing to watch out for is a log with a serious knot. It may take many hits to split one of them. Anyhow, I had my wife, my daughter and a neighbor in my back yard splitting green oak logs from a tree that had gone down in a storm. Good fun.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Moncrief

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous tool for splitting wood. It is so easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This by far the best and fastest wood splitter available. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Chizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool man toy. Very easy to set up and use. sharp blade l o v e I t !
customer_reviews.author: chris bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: We don't need a heavy duty splitter...just one to split average size pieces for a small wood stove. It meets our need perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy N. Neff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smart Splitter worked exactly as advertised. Assembled it myself and was splitting logs in minutes. I LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M

customer_reviews.title: Ecellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to be a safer method of splitting kindling for my husband who has Alzheimer's. He still managed to smash his baby finger 3 stitches worth. He won't use it anymore, of course, but it'll work well for the rest of us. I can manage it and I'm an antique. Very well made and haven't had problems with the part others have, yet anyway. Ingenious.
customer_reviews.author: amartin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got the splitter and it works great my mom of 77 can even use it and it is easy for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE TOOL
customer_reviews.text: the best and still a good workout too. it's more work then the video shows. I did the tip I found on cutting the white bushing. I think it's a must.
customer_reviews.author: eugene deschamps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helped me out a lot for making feather stick kindling for my wood business. Thanks for helping the disabled!
customer_reviews.author: The Woodlot

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money. Can't buy anything like it made in USA. Go EU!! They got this one down to a T.
customer_reviews.author: Jody E. Luce

customer_reviews.title: ... materially that takes a betting and keeps on working fine.
customer_reviews.text: Built with quality materially that takes a betting and keeps on working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bomb!! I always had a hard time helping my husband split wood and could barely lift a maul let alone swing it. I can split a ton of wood myself with this with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: tclvr64

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a christmas present for my mother. It is amazingly easy to use, and much less strenuous. I did not want my mother to be swinging an axe as she gets up there in age and has a bad shoulder. This smart splitter makes it alot easier on her without having to use a big loud electic or gas log splitter. Along with the logs being split with ease, they end up making a cut that is nice and straight.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Saporito

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well! It's much easier than using an axe. You can split huge, huge tree trunks with this! I've split trunks up to 3' in diameter! I am a 5'2" strong woman. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: silly gadget
customer_reviews.text: My axe works better. It does not live up to its billing. I find it to be inconvenient and a waste of money. I went back to using my traditional wedges, go-devil, Axes, etc. I feel ripped off a little. It works, eventually, but not as well as what I was already using.
customer_reviews.author: peter w antonowicz

customer_reviews.title: Firewood splitter
customer_reviews.text: We could not be more satisfied with the Smart Splitter. It made my husband's job splitting firewood so much easier this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe in PA

customer_reviews.title: Wood splitter wonder
customer_reviews.text: I love this splitter. We saw it at a show and the concept seemed so simple. My husband travels a lot, meaning I have to split wood myself. This makes is much easier that weilding a huge ax.
customer_reviews.author: tamonearth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 star review, but this tool does not work well on Eucalyptus wood. However, when it worked, it made my choirs go by very fast. In fact, it was fun.
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: ... but very well made and should make splitting wood easy to use in my longhorn
customer_reviews.text: well built have not used yet but looking forward to using it but very well made and should make splitting wood easy to use in my longhorn smoker
customer_reviews.author: AL T Ray

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because I wasn't able to split anything with this splitter. The quality of the item is good. There are a couple of plastic pieces. I just couldn't operate it like the lady in the video.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lee Squyres

customer_reviews.title: No manual? Really?
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't used the product yet, I'm writing this review because the box says to read the manual carefully but there was no manual included with the splitter. I'm searching online but haven't found one yet. Minus four stars so far. I will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Logosol Smart-Splitter, 14-Ton Manual Log Splitter
feature_bullets: SMART WOOD SPLITTING - The Smart Splitter is an efficient axe that can be used by everyone in your family. It is designed with the focus on safety when you are splitting wood. Perfect for cottage owners, forest owners, firewood management, and homeowners.
14 TONS OF FORCE - . The Smart Splitter always hit the log in the right place with a force of up to 14 tons at the edge.

ERGONOMIC SOLUTION - Unlike using a traditional axe to chop wood, the Smart Splitter spares your back and shoulders from physical strain. The Smart Splitter is of high quality. Due to this, it has a long life.
CONVENIENT STORAGE - The Smart Splitter takes up little space and is easy to use and to store. The Smart Splitter uses no other energy than the one that gives you a good exercise.
TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS - Max. wood length: 55 cm, Recommended wood length: 40 cm, Wood width: Unlimited, Striking weight: 3.5 kg, Total weight: 9.5 kg
